extension.description: Features: - 8 Consoles of choice. - Advanced customized settings are available trough addon settings. - Adult contents support. - Auto generate of predifined CFG, DIFF and NVRAM Arcade's settings. - Download any game directly! Up to 1000 games are available! - Fanart and Posters supports and are available as a download pack or per downloaded game. - Full PS3 Joystick support in-Kodi and in-Game. - Games are categorized by number of possible players. - Genre and Description support. - High performance modules with improved quality. - Smart search. - Smart self restore and update of contents. - Trailers support.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.
